name: Oil Price API
label: OilPriceAPI

auth.notes: Use HTTP Authorization header with your API token (e.g. 'Authorization: Token ABC123').

per_day.notes: Free plan has a monthly quota; no fixed daily limit (daily budgets derived internally).

per_month.notes: Free tier: 500 API calls per calendar month.

per_minute.notes: Free tier limit of 10 calls per minute.

per_second.notes: No explicit per-second limit (limited by per-minute quota).

reset_window.notes: Quota resets at the start of each calendar month.

credits_model.notes: Each API request counts as 1 call towards the monthly quota.

notes: Specialized provider for oil benchmarks, energy commodities, and marine fuel data. Used to enrich commodities data (e.g. energy prices) in Promagen.
